author: coheigea
msg: Disabled some of the SAML systests for the unlimited security case.

author: jleroux
msg: Revert r1088762, this is not a working solution, because wsdl2Java fails to generate stubs with these changes.

We have to fix this though. A temporary solution for clients using CXF underneath is to follow the point 2 at http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/cxf-users/200901.mbox/%3C200901231332.03818.dkulp@apache.org%3E

I think, as it has been already reported by Alexander Graf, it's related to http://www.ws-i.org/profiles/basicprofile-1.1.html#R2735, but this have to be checked... Following recommendations and example there should allow us to deliver WS-I Basic Profile compliant WSDL. Unfortunately I have not enough time for that at the moment.

author: elecharny
msg: o The Value isValid() method throws a LdapInvalidAttributeValueException instead of a LdapException
o The Attribute isValid() method now takes an AttributeType instead of a SyntaxChecker
o Moved the schema aware tests to shared-integ
o Fixed the impacted tests and code
